text:
Currently when variables names in CSV contain spaces they are taken into account.
This enhancement will trim spaces from names as per discussion:

- http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/jmeter-dev/201610.mbox/%3CCAH9fUpba1v88uTWh0gP_eUs-KZgQZJsWrJJJdEXK4EM8bgYjJQ%40mail.gmail.com%3E
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
